ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 8 cores x 16 FP32/cycle (AVX-512) x 2 (FMA) = 256 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 8 cores x 8 FP64/cycle (AVX-512) x 2 (FMA) = 128 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 8 cores x 32 BF16/cycle (AVX-512 BF16) x 2 = 512 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 8 cores x 64 INT8/cycle (AVX-512 VNNI) x 2 = 1024 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Calculated at boost_clock_mhz (5100 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
l3_cache_bandwidth_notes: Zen 4 has unified 16MB L3 per CCD with improved bandwidth. Measured 323 GB/s with PyTorch multi-threaded STREAM at 8MB.
notes: Zen 4 mobile processor with AVX-512 (single 512-bit FMA per core). RDNA 3 integrated GPU (Radeon 780M). Supports AVX-512 BF16 and VNNI.
